title: yall misspelled your name
reviews:
First, yall misspelled your name.

Second, I'd prefer less spam from Timothy Murray, Deliverr Account Executive. I understand that you spent good money buying my name off of some list. That's not a good reason to send me an email and especially not a good reason to send me one every other day.

Might I suggest your sales channels would work better if you corrected the spelling of your name, built a reputation, and stopped trying to annoy random strangers into acquiescence.

title: Awesome Experience with Deliverr!
reviews: Our company needed to find a fulfillment service that would integrate with Amazon and Ebay. Emily was our Account Executive and was instrumental in getting us onboarded to the Deliverr platform. She took time to answer questions and find solutions to any obstacle we faced. We look forward to working with Emily and Deliverr as we introduce new products and sell on other platforms!

title: Great customer service and fulfillment pricing!
reviews: I have had nothing but positive experiences with Deliverr! We've been using them for around 6 months and are super-pleased with their customer service and fulfillment network. Really excited to be a beta-tester for international shipping, which was a boon for fulfillment of our recent Kickstarter campaign.

title: Scaling eComm with Deliverr
reviews: Deliverr has been instrumental in helping to scale our eCommerce business. Their business model helps them keep costs low and the customer service, communication, and synchronization with our existing platforms has been seamless.

title: A Key Partner In Growth
reviews: I see Deliverr as a key in the growth of my brand, Well Life! Working together has already freed up a ton of my time, enabling me to concentrate on developing and launching new products.

title: Deliverr regularly uploading invalid…
reviews: Deliverr regularly uploading invalid tracking putting amazon act health in jeopardy.

title: Great customer service
reviews: Great customer service. The dashboard is very easy to use.

title: Great customer care & best in the line.
reviews:
I am using Deliverr for the last year, and they're top of the line!
Multiple channel integrations.
2-Day badges on most e-commerce sites.
Outstanding customer service.
I deal with Tyler Coopman and dealt with Lauren Lewis they're really amazing in understanding the client's needs and solving them in the quickest possible way, it's amazing to deal with them, they just made the hardest work from an e-commerce business simple!

title: Excellent customer service and fast…
reviews: Excellent customer service and fast delivery. Been using Deliverr for about a year now and overall impressed with the service. Their distributed network of warehouses cuts average package delivery down by more than half. Most of all, extremely responsive with customer service.

title: Overall Outstanding
reviews: Overall Outstanding! Coordinators are always responsive and helpful. Fast shipping is mostly on-time and affordable. Updates useful and exciting new features once in a while. Hope to see some improvements in receiving(sometimes too slow & miss some # here and there)/expansion to international shipping.

title: Overall very happy
reviews: We have been working with Deliverr for a few months now and overall are very happy with them. We switched to them from in-house fulfillment. While we have had a few lost/late packages, we have not had any problems with submitting claims or opening tickets to resolve these/receive credits for them. We have also been working through issues on an ongoing basis (i.e. SKU mapping and fast tags), throughout which our implementation contact and assigned engagement contact have both been very responsive, including via email, Slack, and phone calls. As we identify improvements, we have found that many of these have already been slotted to be added and are excited to continue our partnership with them!

title: I am big fan of Deliverr
reviews: I am big fan of Deliverr. There team is very responsive and the platform gets better week after week.

title: These five-star reviews seem so fake!
reviews: These five-star reviews seem so fake!! The company has horrible service. On several occasions, they delayed our shipment causing us negative reviews. And now constantly packages are being lost. I have no idea why they are using DHL for domestic shipments. We shipped 2 times to a customer and both times the packages were lost. The customer is extremely angry. I do not recommend this company. It used to be good but now it is all negative. We stopped working with them a month ago. Still stuck with lost packages and trying to figure out what to do!!

title: AMAZING customer experience
reviews: I have had the greatest pleasure working with our account executive, Brian, on all our latest business ventures. He has been incredibly helpful throughout the entire process and he genuinely cares for his clients and their respective business. Deliverr has such an easy and seamless process getting set up and orders flowing through for our Shopify and Amazon business. I couldn't be happier with my experience with Brian and Deliverr, and I am excited to see what the future holds for both of our businesses.

title: A very good experience!
reviews: I appreciate the experience with my sales representative as he was always ready to assist me. Plus, he was friendly. I trusted him. I wish I would have understood the implications of using Deliverr for FBM when I had the same item listed as FBA, but I am in the learning stage. Thank you to the sales rep at Deliverr.

title: Archana is the reason we use Deliverr
reviews: We've worked with amazon's FBA, rakuten logistics and I can tell you w/o a doubt the support, knowledge base and tech aggregate into this shipping company has created a stack no e-com can do w/o. You have our business for the next 10 years.

title: Our experience with Deliverr thus far
reviews: Our experience with Deliverr thus far, as far as procedure and staff, has been very efficient and professional. The technology is great and very user-friendly. We would recommend their services. We see them as a viable option as far as efficiency and cost-effectiveness.

title: shipping fee is 2 times than you ship plus inventory fee
reviews:
1: Shipping fee: calculator is off from your real charge, I have evidence, calculator: $5 for 0.5lb, the real charge is $14! All online owners, when you see this, do you think you are making money for them?

2: Arriving late: over 50% of orders are delayed arrive sometimes are lost

3: Removing inventory is extremely expensive

title: Love Them - Huge Conversion Booster
reviews:
Love This Company So Much! I highly recommend using the Fast Tags to any merchant as they boost conversions past what I even thought was possible. By turning these on I was able to see a 400%+ increase in sales which was stunning. I was skeptical, but am very happy I decided to use Deliverr.

In addition, you are provided free resources and advice free of charge. While not advertised greatly, it is super helpful. My account manager Archana has been very helpful and has helped me resolve any issues I have and has even provided me access to countless resources that are helping me grow my business.

title: Great fulfillment company for CPG brands
reviews: As an early seller on Deliverr, they're a great fulfillment company with integrations with all major marketplaces. Acharna is a rockstar and has helped make introductions and offer new growth opportunities, and helped confirm everything was working great with Walmart.com and eBay.com

title: Deliverr has been super fast and super…
reviews:
Deliverr has been super fast and super reliable for my business.
My account manager Archana has been so helpful in any issue I may have and helping to provide the best service to our customers!

title: Excellent Customer Support
reviews: Our experience with Deliverr has been extremely positive. They have been able to quickly get us set up on all of our channels and effectively integrate them. Any fulfillment, inbounding, or technical issues were immediately addressed by Deliverr support. Archana, our assigned growth manager, has also been extremely helpful in providing updates and presenting great growth opportunities. What Deliverr does really well is manage integrations across multiple channels. They are definitely worth it if one is willing to pay a little extra for fulfillment fees compared to something like FBA.

title: Great customer experience
reviews: I had a great customer experience working with Archana Somasegar and also with Shawn Sprauer. Thanks for all the support guys!!

title: Fully satisfied
reviews: We are using Deliverr since Aug 2020 for fulfillment of our Walmart's orders. Fully satisfied with them!

title: The service provided by the Deliverr…
reviews:
The service provided by the Deliverr team is outstanding.
They take care of everything; pack, ship, update the tracking info and etc.
You only need to ship your products to their warehouse and save time on all aspects of fulfillment.
Highly recommend their services.

title: Great Company
reviews: Deliverr is very efficient and cares about customer service. They work hard to make sure you are taken care of. I have recommended them to many people already.

title: Deliverr Needs to Improve
reviews:
Deliverr, does not really live up to its standards.
For example, it provides free "WISH 2 Days" shipping and begins the fulfillment 2 or 3 days later and still charges you $7.5 for this shipment.
This is really absurd and I have had customers complained exactly about this.
I fulfill items myself and compared to Deliverr I am way faster.
I can show concrete examples as proof to everything I have just stated here.
Please Deliverr, Improve! Improve your services.

title: Can't Ship on Time
reviews:
Avoid using Deliverr, they were about 84% on-time ship rate for us before we had to ship from our 3PL for the delayed orders to meet platform KPI. Not only is this added manual work for us, but sometimes the Deliverr platform doesn't let you cancel orders that are "packed and ready to ship" even though they are 3 business days delayed already. Now we're forced to decide whether to risk double shipping an order or get dinged for a late ship. This means those customers will get two shipments and have the option to return one of the shipments for a refund.

Unfortunately, there is a high cost of removal from Deliverr, so we're held as a hostage until we sell out what we have of our inventory there. I (my pocketbook too!) regret trying Deliverr. We're switching back fulfillment to our third-party warehouse instead. Link it with EDI SaaS like shipstation, find an account with discounted ship rates, and you'll end up having more reliability and about the same cost even without the economy of scale.

Not to mention you won't run the risk of getting gutted by the storage fees at Deliverr.

title: I was looking for answers regarding…adding new items and creating a shipping plan
reviews: I was looking for answers regarding how to expand beyond our current portfolio. I went to the Deliverr website and a chat box showed up almost immediately. I was then able to connect with one of the folks at Deliverr, Brian Williams. To simplify the process further, I was able to then connect with Brian on Zoom and he walked me through the site. He answered all my questions and gave me a solid overview of Deliverr and its capabilities. It was a best in class experience. I don't usually write reviews - but this was an exceptional customer experience. Thank you Brian and thank you Deliverr. Keep it up!

title: Great initial experience and excited about our partnership with Deliverr
reviews: I recently completed my onboarding with Deliverr and my experience has been very positive so far, the tools and processes seem to work fine and efficient for us, a big part of this is the excellent customer service, my account executive Amir Bavani has been great in walking us through each step in the way, moreover giving us strategic insights and advise that we are excited to carry out as will definitely help grow our business. Very appreciative of Amir and the team's support which has made us feel Deliverr is a true partner for the long run.

title: Seamless, Unparalleled D2C Fulfillment Experience
reviews: We recently sent in a few pallets to Deliverr for two of our brands. Both brands are now fulfilling just about all online orders through Deliverr. Without a doubt, Deliverr's customer service, interface, and rates have been unparalleled. We have multiple reps reviewing our account on a daily basis, offering suggestions and solutions to maximize our fulfillment performance across all channels. It's been a seamless experience. I'm eager to shift more of our business to Deliverr and rely on them as our #1 fulfillment provider.

title: Excellent Experience!
reviews: We started setting up Deliver in late November and had our first shipment out in January this year. Tiffany from Deliverr has been excellent and the customer service provided was top notch. She is always there to answer our queries and also helped us set up the whole process. Excellent experience with them!

title: Great Experience
reviews:
We have a good experience so far, they are -professional and their fulfillment cost is lower than many other fulfillment companies. Deliverr portal is easy to use and their team responsive and resolve your problems. They have connectivity with many marketplace and growing fast with other one as well.

They have a bright future

title: Deliverr is a great service and a key partner
reviews: Deliverr is a great service and a key part of my business. They are reliable, fair, and a good partner. Highly recommended.

title: A stable partner that contributes directly to our bottom line
reviews:
Deliverr is proving to be an instrumental part of our growth and scaling.

We hit a point where our limiting factor was not the number of potential sales we could capture, but the volume or orders we could physically get out the door of our warehouse. Partnering with Deliverr makes it much easier for us to support a significantly higher sales volume, get customers their products faster, and limit liabilities associated with shipping all of our products from a single location.

Integration with any new service or partner usually has its own set of unique obstacles, but Deliverr's support has been there for us and helps us work through the issues. Support has always been available, transparent, and quick to resolve issues.

Not only are they proving to be a stable fulfillment partner which allows us to support higher sales volume, but the many integration features are helping us on the marketing side as well. We are able to get several customer touch points in place to help customers make purchasing decisions with more confidence.

Overall we expect the partnership to be a strong one for many years to come, and are looking forward to future growth together.

title: Great service around the US and nice…
reviews: Great service around the US and nice support guys for any issue.

title: Volume Up/ Expenses Down
reviews: Since we started using Deliverr , our volume has gone way up , while our shipping/handling expenses have gone down. Customers love the 2 Day delivery tag that comes with using Deliverr.

title: Our Growth Manager is great to work…
reviews: Our Growth Manager is great to work with; the options of retailers for us to access through Deliverr is impressive and gives us lots of visibility in the marketplace. Their customer support team is somewhat slow in response time though.

title: Review from a REAL Deliverr client - service has gone seriously downhill.
reviews:
Don't do it! I have been a Deliverr client for 16 months. Their service is a great concept and prices are great, and it started out OK, but they are growing way too fast or something. The service has seriously gone downhill in the last few months. For example:
- Orders over Cyber Monday took 2 weeks to ship out and almost got canceled by Walmart. Despite what Deliverr claims, this still hurts your Walmart delivery metrics.
- They are CONSTANTLY losing inventory now - both inbound and inventory in their warehouse. They sit on orders for a few days and then email you saying you should manually fulfill it, because they lost the inventory, leaving you to scramble to ship it out yourself. This is happening for 30-50% of orders lately.
- Their support is helpful but EXTREMELY slow. It takes WEEKS and multiple messages to hear back from them. Several times, I had to email their executive team directly to get any kind of response.
- They don't add any bubble wrap or protective packing to boxes. They literally stick your product inside a big cardboard box and seal it up. Absolutely indefensible for a reputable fulfillment company like them. I emailed about this multiple times, but they didn't seem at all concerned about it and didn't promise they would change anything.
I do not recommend them anymore!

title: Deliver has really came through for me…
reviews: Deliver has really came through for me this year. I was selling close to 200 items a week November and December and Deliverr did a great job filling those orders. I they took the stress out of shipping for me and my customer received there product in a timely manner

title: We bet on Deliverr and are very happy…
reviews: We bet on Deliverr and are very happy with the results. We started with Deliverr in 2018. We grew our volume with them 7x during 2020 in the pandemic. With FBA disrupted, Deliverr did an amazing job scaling their operations to handle a ton of new demand in a tough environment. They are the first company - even before Walmart or any of the other incumbents - to succeed in creating a viable FBA alternative.

title: I sent 2000 units for the first time…
reviews: I sent 2000 units for the first time and they lost 800 units. I sent the second time 6600 units, and the lost 2000 units. No refunds. This is a horrible company. The receiving time for inbound shipment takes months. Last time took 3 months. It is horrible.

title: A joke of a company.
reviews: Site looks easy to use, but that's where the positives end. Outbound SLAs are frequently missed with no penalty. New warehouses are frequently onboarded and offboarded, causing inventory to be unavailable for weeks while moved from warehouse to warehouse. Inbounds take almost a month to check in. Shipments are frequently lost or tracking information is simply incorrect and the claims policy is inconsistent. I do not trust inventory levels, and canceled orders for stockouts frequently occur without fast alert (email takes 2+ days to let me know an order has been canceled) or visibility into why an order was canceled. These issues are frequently blamed on listing tools, while I experience the same issues creating orders manually. I have had customers contact me to let me know they have received 10s of extra units they did not order (and I can only imaging how many hundreds of units are out in the world that customers have not let me know they have). Support team is not well trained and obviously understaffed as tickets take days and sometimes weeks to receive a response. Measuring process is inconsistent and warehouses frequently make mistakes; I have had to manually audit all my dimensions and request reimbursement for overcharged fees. Tickets frequently need to be escalated as support staff cannot keep up with frequently changing policies. I can't wait until I sell through my inventory with this terrible company and can sever my relationship; I do not trust they can accurately remove my inventory.

title: I got all answers I need
reviews: I got all answers I need. Great help! Thanks a lot!

title: Great feedback
reviews: Great feedback. I was offered great detail and content about my situation in order for me to make an informed decision about my business. Thanks Tyler

title: Deliverr is by far one of the best 3PL…
reviews: Deliverr is by far one of the best 3PL providers in the market! The team is knowledgeable and ahead of the curve at every step. Deliverr is constantly innovating with new fast shipping delivery options on increasingly more marketplaces making it so easy to expand discoverability.

title: Brilliant service
reviews: Brilliant service! reliable, fast, and easy interface for sellers

title: Helping us achieve our goals!
reviews:
The Deliverr team has been instrumental in helping Kaspien execute on our marketplace growth strategies and providing creative business solutions through this extremely volatile time in supply chain management.

Our Account Manager provides us with a very high level of tailored customer service and is constantly looking for growth opportunities. We appreciate all of the support from the Deliverr team!

title: Great Partner!
reviews: Deliverr has been a great partner to us over the years. This year they have been especially vital in helping us diversify our fulfillment options, which has allowed us continued growth in an unprecedented year.

title: Complete Scam
reviews:
The slowest and least reliable service ever created. 30 Percent of my packages were lost in transit, my items weighed 7 Lbs and they placed it in a bag to ship.
Their system randomly does not connect with Walmart and ebay.
Support is virtually nill.
They are always shipping packages out late.

They reached out to make it right, I will see what happens and update accordingly

title: Deliverr is a scam.
reviews:
Since we signed up in October, Deliverr has cost us thousands of dollars while losing 1/4 of our inbounded inventory. They have ZERO support. They're STILL INBOUNDING after a full month of having our inventory. Our AM has been kind but she definitely misled us during on our onboarding. I feel bad for her because she has to do the work of this awful company. I wish we never started doing business with Deliverr because they're solely responsible for crippling our US business, which is detrimental to us as an apparel startup.

Please steer clear and use one of their competitors, Deliverr is a CON.

title: Tyler and Nick are awesome and always…
reviews: Tyler and Nick are awesome and always down to help. You will never feel that they are from a company you're working with, they're more of friends who are always willing to lend their helping hands and go extra when it comes to assistance on Deliverr. Thanks, you guys! :)

title: Awesome, trustworthy and reliable company!
reviews: I have been working with Deliverr since March of this year, we are niche board game company and only this year started selling through our own Shopify website / Walmart. As we needed to branch away from Amazon. They have been great to work with, especially our account manager Damian has been super helpfull and is alway quick to respond to any questions. We had some issues with meeting the cut off point for sending in stock for Black Friday due to our logistics partner, but it all got processed on time and we are in good shape now. Their rates are highly competitive and can't be beat! Our products have smallish profit margins and they were the only company that was able to make self fulfillment worth our while.

title: Deliverr has been great for me since…
reviews:
Deliverr has been great for me since day 1. I have dealt with Shawn & Damian and they are both superb in terms of helping me with everything I need.

I've had multiple hiccups and they are super quick to respond and get things fixed in a very timely manner. Everything ships same day if placed before 2pm EST which is amazing.

Thanks again!

title: Deliverr service and support is suck
reviews: Deliverr service and support is terrible. They are not a well oiled machine and have not been able to grow into the pants they wish to wear. When you have inevitable problems that are costing you money you just cant get a resolution out of them. I hate the ticket system that goes unanswered and then does not resolve your issue. No chat, no phone, no responsible support. For they type of business they are doing they should be more responsive. Even before the crazy recent growth they failed at this. I know they are the only game in town so I continue to use them but they make me uncomfortable knowing they are unable to stop loosing me money.

title: I want to use Deliverr however this…
reviews:
I want to use Deliverr however this company like many others do not have any phone support. I want to talk with a representative at the company before I spend money with them. Not having any phone contact signals to me that they expect trust without any upfront conversation with a real person. I do not operate my business this way. If you can't have any conversations with a customer there is something very wrong with your business plan.

A Sales person did contact me and I am happy with the conversation. Looking forward to working with Deliverr moving forward.

title: Their on time shipping is 85.64%
reviews: Their on time shipping is 85.64%. that's only 381 orders in the last 20 days. Just terrible.

title: Great company and service
reviews:
We switched to Deliverr as our 3PL vendor recently, very happy with them.

The onboarding and inbound shipping process are smooth and seamless, also outbound delivery is fast and on time.

Deliverr is able to connect with all main marketplaces and provide fast tags across the board. For a multi-channel seller, this is a huge benefit.

Meanwhile, they constantly release new product features as well as visionary thought leadership content. Love it!

title: Extra Ordinary Service!!!
reviews: I decided to go with Deliverr because their pricing was unmatched. Their service however, is even better than their pricing! I was up against a deadline to get thousands of orders out the door and my shipment was delayed at the port, Damian and Johnny worked with me tirelessly to make sure the product got received in and shipped out as fast as possible. I am supremely impressed by their efforts and how much they cared. As if it was their own business!

title: Deliverr is amazing for Shopify users
reviews: I just signed up with Deliverr and I love the software and customer service. I have a wonderful rep Paige, who guided me through the process of packing my inventory and getting it out to their warehouses. I use Shopify and now everything Is streamlined, I don't have to touch anything!

title: I wish I could give them ZERO stars
reviews:
Editing my review - Their Business Operations manager reached out to me and helped me sort all previous issues. Thanks for that!

Having said that I have decided not to do business with Deliverr anymore (overall not a good experience)


I wish I could give them ZERO stars. This is the worst company I ever dealt with - its been more than 2 months that I have been emailing them back and forth about the number of packages they lost in transit and these guys behave like shameless people not to bother about anything - they have been asking me repeated questions again and again - first they asked for the invoice which I gladly shared, now they are asking me for BOM - why on Earth do I need a BOM to prove that I shipped the inventory to them, when they themselves agree that they lost track of the count. My so called account manager they have for me never ever bothered to reply to their email. I wish I knew this all before even starting with them - PLEASE DO NOT FALL FOR VICTIM TO THEIR S**T SERVICES - They will keep charging you for the storage costs even when you ask them to remove/dispose your inventory. Being a business owner myself, I generally prefer not to leave bad reviews for anyone but these guys left no other option for me.

title: Great pricing, tech and customer support.
reviews: After researching a ton of fulfillment solutions, we landed on Deliverr because of their great pricing and integration with key marketplaces offering 2-day shipping. After getting started we were pleasantly surprised with their easy tech setup and personalized support. They also offered support and resources for marketing our products. Overall we're quite pleased with our decision to use Deliverr and look forward to scaling with their services.

title: regret ever joining them
reviews:
regret ever joining them.
Inbounds are rarely received within the said time frame. Talking about 3weeks plus delays and all they will tell you is 'they are investigating'

My goods were to be shipped in boxes as per agreement but they kept shipping in polybags causing damage. All they will do is reimburse you (for the customers who cared to complain. The others will simply never come back. ( got less returning customers from their side). They will promise it won't happen again, then it does the very next few days.

Pretty common for orders to remain hanging after they have been marked as fulfilled. I'd only realise after some chargebacks hit me or refund request emails from customers.

They cannot manage their business.Yet i entrusted mine in their hands to manage.

As im writing im still waiting for them to receive my inbound. 8 days delayed. Got to know their affiliated partner warehouses gives priority to their clients. So we from Deliverr are treated as second class. Explains the inbound receiving delays

All their failures are now blamed on Covid-19😏. Leaving you is a releif

title: Its been Great!
reviews:
Its been great! Deliverr is one of the best fulfillment services out there. It rivals and beats FBA in many categories. The UI is easy to work with, there are always improvements and new integrations. Sometimes there are some small issues here and there, but in the end they always get solved.

I look forward for more and more growth and improvements!

title: Great service
reviews:
Great service - good shipping rates. Inbound can be expensive but they assist with that sometimes. Support is always good. Wish they had better rates for multiple piece shipments.
Overall highly recommend using them

title: Excellent partner to build business!
reviews: Deliverr has helped to build my business to new channels and new levels. The staff at Deliverr is very helpful and actually very encouraging and motivating to help us build our business in ways we didn't know were available. I highly recommend using Deliverr if you are interested in scaling your business!

title: Immediately increased sales with help from a personal growth manager
reviews:
Our company signed up with Deliverr to mainly increase sales on the Walmart.com platform. We immediately observed an increase in sales with the 2-day delivery tag. The fulfillment fees for Walmart orders are fair and we are satisfied with the service. There are some aspects that can be improved, but Deliverr is doing its' best during this pandemic with the resources available.

There are two aspects of Deliverr that I find unique and advantageous. First, we are able to receive support from an actual person. Our growth manager has been consistent about checking in with us and helping our company thrive with Deliverr (Thanks, Tyler!) With the other third-party fulfillment service, we are constantly being passed around to different people and has been difficult to get issues resolved timely. Second, they support multi-platform with the same inventory. We are able to link several listings from multiple platforms to a single inventory SKU. This feature is clever and allows us to expand our offers easily among several platforms.

Now, there are a few flaws. Shipping has been generally good, but there is definitely room for improvement. Also, customer service is our responsibility. FBA is convenient since customer service is provided, but I understand why Deliverr cannot provide customer service on our behalf.

title: Good company with some human customer service!
reviews:
Fast and affordable they have excellent customer service and account managers of course sometimes we have delays to answer the tickets, but 99% of the time they are on time and we can get some Human contact, I think that is great too.

They also have a lot of webinars that educate our stakeholders and show some cases that we can improve our sales.

Almost 1 year working with them is 9.8/10 bc nobody is perfect!

We see a long way working together.

title: Deliverr has been a lifesaver for us
reviews:
Deliverr has been a lifesaver for us. With the current situation online, we found ourselves blocked from Amazon and sending inventory into FBA. Deliverr allowed us to find a back-up solution that works well with other marketplaces and sales channels.

Their 2-day and next day badges helped our website grow from $10,000 a month last year to $150,000 a month this year.

The only cons are that some of the carriers partnered with Deliverr have a tendency to lose shipments. But this could also be attributed to the increase shipment numbers of 2020 across the board. The other problem is that having a third party fulfill our orders increases a harder to resolve customer service questions as most customer service questions revolve around fulfillment. However, Deliverr does a great job at owning their mistakes and processing claims.

Overall, Deliverr is a headed towards a 5 start fulfillment service and is definitely a major asset to multi-channel fulfillment.

title: Deliverr Cares and Goes the Extra mile
reviews:
We moved from Amazon FBA to Deliverr we are now using multiple sales channels.
Emily Callahan has done an excellent job of onboarding our companies inventory and fulfillment needs, along with referring us to key sales channels. Damian Sandenbergh is my Rep now and he has proven extremely helpful. My orders are being fulfilled in a timely manner. When I have experienced serious issues within a reasonable time period Deliverr has stepped up to the plate and helped to reach win-win solutions. Thanks again to Alain, Hillary, and Moses in customer support! Mistakes happen, what we do about them is what separates winners from losers! Deliverr is a winner, I highly recommend them!

title: Customer-focused Experience! Highly Recommend
reviews: From the start, the Devlierr team has very helpful with the on boarding process and through our first shipment to their warehouse. When minor discrepancies did arise, the Deliverr team assigned an active representative to help us resolve them in a timely and professional manner. Compared to Amazon's customer service, Deliverr's is orders of magnitudes better! You can tell Deliverr appreciates each of their clients and wants them to succeed!

title: Fast, seamless, transparent and amazing on-boarding experience
reviews:
Deliverr has gone above and beyond expectations so far. Everything from their transparency and easy to understand pricing model, easy setup process and incredible on-boarding support. I worked with Fulfillment specialist Shawn S. and was extremely impressed. This is not a back office call center team. We had 2 calls and walked me through setup and even recommended that I get setup on Walmart and told me how to get fast tags on Google and Facebook. The support doesn't stop there either, I'm going to be working with an engagement manager to help me optimize my e-commerce sites.

In under 2 weeks, I setup my Deliverr account, sent shipments to Deliverr, signed up and went live on Walmart, Etsy, Facebook Shop and Shopify. Prior to using Deliverr, I only sold on Amazon.

As a small business owner, I'm excited to take my business to the next level and Deliverr has made it incredibly easy. I only wish I knew about them sooner. Thank you all!

title: Account support is non-existent
reviews: Account support is non-existent. My products are consistently getting damaged in transit due to poor packaging (plastic bottles in basic plastic envelopes), and my account rep does not even bother responding to my emails. I feel bad for already recommending Deliverr to a couple of people, will not make this mistake again.

title: The following is a complaint message…
reviews:
The following is a complaint message sent to our account manager at Deliverr. WE did not receive a response.

Tyler,

Our account has been inaccesible for 3 days now without resolution--the system stopped recognizing it. We will be moving both of our accounts to another service as soon as possible:
• Tech support is incompetent, often referring problems to “other team members” who then fail to respond in a timely manner, if at all.
• Tech support response time is never prompt, sometimes taking 48 hours+ to respond that a response is coming.
• Deliverr has no method for personal contact, email only. This isn’t enough in case of an emergency, and there does not appear to be any prioritization of support requests.
• Apparently customer support closes on the weekends.
• All businesses must deal with the problems of the Corona Virus, but Deliverr has demonstrated no ability to adapt or improve its support.

We request you forward this information as far up the company ladder as possible. Deliverr is a company that is “in over its head.”

SDS Worldwide/DARA, INC.

title: Happy New Customer
reviews:
My company has had a very good experience with Deliverr and could definitely recommend them. We sell supplements and were looking for a new pick, pack, ship partner around 2 months ago. We chose Deliverr over ShipBob and so far are very happy with our choice.

- To date we have sent in 2 inbound shipments, each to 4 different fulfillment centers. The receiving has been relatively slow (1 to 2 weeks) but all items have been eventually received with no errors or missing inventory.
- Deliverr has shipped out to numerous customers using ground, expedited and Walmart 2-day delivery. These shipments have all gone out either same day or next business day. We also sent some test shipments and the packages all arrived in good condition. A small issue is that the packaging used varies from warehouse to warehouse and there is no packing slip or invoice included.
- Our account executive, Shawn Sprauer, did a great job both during the sales process and while we were onboarding with Deliverr. He also helped us get approved to sell on Walmart and really made a difference during the Walmart onboarding process. We are now selling on Walmart with free 2-day delivery.

Overall, it has been a very positive experience with Deliverr and specifically with Shawn Sprauer and I can fully recommend them to other companies looking for a new fulfillment partner.

title: Good idea, but dis-functional software coupled with mediocre customer service support.
reviews:
Good idea, but bad software coupled with mediocre customer service support.

MAIN ISSUES

1. Deliverr is a B2B software + service. But they do not allow user permissions. Organizations cannot create sub-accounts for employees to use. Everyone is forced to use the main master account which include sensitive billing info and other user functions that the shipping manager does not need access too.

2. Initial registered email on Deliverr account cannot be changed. The first and only email you can ever sign up with Deliverr is set in stone and unable to be changed at all in the future. YESSS, its 2020 and this is still happening!!

3. Deliverr's software does not allow you to untie a sales channel integration. So if you integrated a sales channel with a Deliverr account. Be prepared for that sales channel to lock into your Deliverr account FOREVER.

This was my experience. I signed up with Deliverr and with my google account, thinking I can just create a sub-account for my staff...

WRONG - no user permission function available. Our whole organization need to use the registered email to log in. and I had already integrated my sales channel to the account.

NO PROBLEM? We signed up using a new email, Fresh start. Ready to start sending in goods and becoming a paying customer.

BUT NOOOO. new email would not allow us to integrate our sales channel. Stating it is still tied to the old account.

Reached out to customer service, it took them 8 days to come to the conclusion that they are unable to untie it, and said they can change over the registered google account to another email.

I gave them the email, and they have completely ghosted and never heard about. The standard protocol for Deliverr's customer service is if they do not have an answer for the customer, they will just ignore them.

title: PLEASE invest in your customer service!
reviews: When it work, it works great! It is a simple and cost effective method for shipping across the US. BUT you are screwed the second you have any sort of issue. This is for the simple reason that there is no one to speak to. You have to create tickets that take 24 to 48 hours to get a response. Usually the response you just waited 2 days for is them asking for more information, then prepare to wait another 2 days to hear back. I have to escalate almost every issue with my account manager otherwise the average resolution time is about 2 weeks. Deliverr, if you are reading this, your company has so much potential! PLEASE invest in a live customer service team. You are killing us with the current lack of support for your customers!

title: Great help, Thanks Tyler Coopman!
reviews:
Tyler gave me some great help today in regards to moving my product sales forward and updated me with everything that Deliverr has in the works. He was able to answer all of my questions in a very professional and informative manner.
He even sent me valuable links to pages I should know about.
I'm so grateful he reached out to me to help with my products.

title: Thank you so much Tyler Coopman! You rock!
reviews: Thank you so much Tyler Coopman for the awesome information and tips you gave me on optimizing Walmart listings. I appreciate your expertise and assistance. Your professionalism, customer service skills and business acumen confirmed that I made the right choice in selecting Deliverr as my fulfillment and shipping service. Looking forward to implementing what you shared and increasing traffic flow to my products. It was a joy speaking with you. I look forward to calling you soon with a positive update.

title: Deliverr not honoring onboarding promotions
reviews:
Deliverr did indeed call us the same day I posted this review below. They were very supportive and granted us the advertised promotion.

Our company rarely writes reviews, but are having such a difficult time with Deliverr onboarding promotions, this warranted a quick 5 minutes. We are (were) a $2 million company, trying our best to manage and weather the COVID storm. With supply chain and fulfillment understandably locking up at Amazon, we were turning to new vendors to assist us for our B2C deliveries from various channels. Deliverr came highly recommended by a few business colleagues! We were told about a $500 promotion - both for the onboarding company (us) as well as the firm who referred Deliverr.

But once we signed up, our IT team spent a half business day integrating with our Walmart account, eBay account, Ecommerce site, and Amazon Prime ... that sales rep simply "ghosted" and refused to approve the promotion.

Really bad business and pretty harsh customer service - especially given the hurdles we small companies are all facing during the economy changes. What a lost opportunity, as we would have turned around and referred then to all of our network of company owners?

Kelly, VP Sales and Marketing
Urban Infant Inc.

title: I seldom write reviews
reviews:
I seldom write reviews, but this one for Deliverr is irresistible...

The 'true' heart & soul of a company shows when things go out of the ordinary. With the current Corona crisis, the shipping world is - obviously - haywire but not Deliverr! Despite all, hey have their ducks in a perfect row.

Our contact, Damian S, is literally an acting chief-therapist-officer handholding us every step of the way.

As a serial entrepreneur, I have dealt with 'many' providers over the years: Deliverr takes the cake!

title: Deliverr
reviews:
We've used Deliverr to fulfill our Walmart Marketplace orders since late summer 2019. I cannot say enough about their support, service and genuine care of my business.

Highly responsive, dedicated support has impressed me since day one. I am continuously looking for ways to grow my business with Deliverr and am confident they are the perfect fulfillment source for us.

title: Deliverr is great
reviews: Deliverr is great. Their platform is very intuitive and their customer service is very responsive. We highly recommend. Our rep Tyler Coopman has been especially helpful during a critical time for our business.

title: Very professional
reviews: Very professional, easy to use platform. Tyler Coopman is very helpful. Every time we have question, he can answer me immediately.

title: Very Helpful
reviews:
Tyler Coopman is very helpful for me to say.
Help me to understand policy and make plans on time.

title: Our experience with Deliverr has been…
reviews: Our experience with Deliverr has been outstanding so far. The onboarding process was quick and seamless. Getting our inventory set up on their platform was a piece of cake. The Deliverr platform is intuitive and easy to work with - just the right features to enable us to manage our inventory, schedule shipments, monitor invoices and payments, and manage integrations with marketplaces. So far, we have scheduled both UPS and LTL pallet shipments; both were easy to schedule within the Deliverr app and everything arrived quickly and appeared in our inventory within a few days of scheduling. The best part of working with Deliverr has been our account manager, Tim McDonnell - he has been absolutely outstanding. He has been incredibly approachable, quick to respond, super friendly, and personally invested in our experience and success with Deliverr. I can't tell you how incredible it is to have someone like him on the inside to assist with the onboarding process and move things along. We have already noticed a noticeable uptick in our sales and conversion rates on both our own website and marketplaces like eBay and Walmart. Highly recommended!

title: Working with Deliverr has been great
reviews: Working with Deliverr has been great. Their extremely helpful support team provides prompt and relevant responses. Looking forward to continuing to partner our business with Deliverr!

title: Deliverr is a best ever possible…
reviews: Deliverr is a best ever possible alternative to have if you want to expand your online business, especially when you have multi-channel store fronts. Have been using them for close to a year now. Comparing to Amazon/Walmart seller support, these guys are great to work with.

title: Deliverr makes web sales easy!
reviews: I put off setting up fulfillment by Deliverr fearing it would be difficult and time consuming. Big mistake! The process was fast and easy. Deliverr has an excellent video that walks you through the setup process. Thank you Deliverr.

title: Ben Schwartz is awesome to work
reviews: Ben Schwartz is awesome to work. He knows the industry very well with his background coming from some of the major players.

title: bad communication
reviews: bad communication - I am not getting a response to any of the cases I have opened.

title: Fast response time
reviews:
Deliverr was extremely helpful when I reached out with an issue.

Their response time was very quick and they immediately jumped on resolving the issue.

title: Use Deliverr to Boost Your Business!
reviews:
Use Deliverr to Boost Your Business!

What an amazing 3PL service. Low fulfillment fees - lower than Amazon FBA! Extremely reliable, with amazing user support. Could not recommend enough!

title: Deliverr has been great to work with…
reviews:
Deliverr has been great to work with and they offer competitive pricing, especially for 2-day shipping.

Hoping they will offer returns and EDI capabilities which I believe they are working on now.

Overall they have been great to work with!

title: Highly recommend
reviews: Working with the deliver team has been a pleasure. They made getting set-up and managing of our marketplace fulfillment a breeze so we can now focus on digital marketing.

title: Very convenient and user-friendly…
reviews: Very convenient and user-friendly process. Amazing Customer Service. They gave us a priority and provided complete support whenever we needed it. Just because of Deliverr we could start Walmart FBA. A++

title: Deliverr is the new kid on the block of…
reviews:
Deliverr is the new kid on the block of shipping services, and it gain traction as a great solution.
It's main advantages:
1) It gives you a quick shipping badge / 2 days shipping / etc. This increases conversion and sales of your products, and you can see it almost instantly.
And when conversion grows, usually your ranking grows across all keywords, which brings even more sales.
2) Ease of use - this is by far the simplest and most streamlined system on the market. It's much easier to use Deliverr to create orders, fulfill orders and even inbound shipments.
I might add that the platform also have a very pleasant interface and colors.
3) Integration - Very easy to integrate to many channels like Walmart, Ebay, Shopify and what not, or you can use a service in the middle like Sellbrite or others, we like GoDataFeed best.
4) It's alive! By this I mean the platform keeps improving, and fast. Just last month they added an option to inbound all shipments to one location (Before you had to send it to 4 different locations) and it's improving every week.
5) Alerts - The system gives you alert when the customer address is not correct and needs fixing, and it's very easy to handle that. The platform also suggest full addresses once you paste the street, and that's a great time-saving feature.

title: We are using Deliverr to handle our…
reviews:
We are using Deliverr to handle our Walmart orders and our website orders. So far it has been a great experience. Getting set up has been very easy and they have been super helpful through out the process. Even tho it has only been a few weeks now, we have seen a great improvement in sales.

I would recommend Deliverr to anyone! Keep up the great work.

title: They grew too fast and were not ready…
reviews: They grew too fast and were not ready for our business over Nov/Dec of last year. Inbounds took weeks to receive. Items were not shipped on time. Don't waste your time with them.

title: Service works great and the initial rep…
reviews: Service works great and the initial rep assigned to me (Nick) went way above and beyond to help me setup my account and feel comfortable it would work the way I wanted.

title: We are using Deliverr to handle Walmart…
reviews:
We are using Deliverr to handle Walmart orders,
this is new startup and they are growing super fast,
there are hickups here and there , but
those guys at deliverr working 24x7 to make sure
to handle all problem arising , will definitely recommend this business
for your fulfillment needs .

title: Using Deliverr to manage our Walmart…
reviews: Using Deliverr to manage our Walmart experience. While we have issues with Walmart, Deliverr is excellent. They are fast to respond, proactive on all issues, and Tyler is a pro. Actually believe we can grow this business with them and Walmart.

title: Great support system
reviews: Great support system. It is a nice change to have an actual person to talk to regarding any issue we might have.

title: Fantastic.
reviews: I've had a fantastic experience with Deliverr. It was super easy to get onboarded, all contacts at Deliverr have been friendly and quick to reply to my requests, and the user interface has been very intuitive. Highly recommend.

title: AMAZING RATES - Great Service - Easy to Use - By Far one of the best Fulfillment services
reviews:
Efficient - Incredible Rates - Friendly Reps and Fast Service.
Deliverr has quickly become a major player in the Fulfillment world. Their rates and ability to deliver packages in 2 days make them a no-brainer when trying to offer Fast shipping on platforms like Walmart. This is an evolving company that in a few months has made very positive changes and I think they're constantly trying to find out how to better serve Us, their grateful clients and they've been very attentive and ingenious in their offering.
Their system is VERY MODERN easy to use, the whole process from on-boarding to activation is very simple and we absolutely have made them an integral part of our strategy going forward.

title: Delvierr is amazing!!!
reviews: Delvierr is amazing! I now send orders 2-day shipping for less than it cost to send standard anywhere else. I not longer have any angry customers asking where packages are (they always arrived in time), and the conversion rate on our website went up significantly when we added 2-day shipping. I really think everyone should be using Deliverr, it will boost your sales and customer satisfaction! HIGHLY recommend!

title: We’ve been using Deliverr as our 3rd…
reviews:
We’ve been using Deliverr as our 3rd party logistics provider, as they integrate simply with Channel Advisor and simplify our marketplace logistics.
They’ve improved their service a lot over the last year, offering freight forwarding and reducing minimum quantities.
We sell across several marketplaces and have 2 day on all of them.
We’ve enjoyed working with them immensely.

title: Aside being a great service from an…
reviews: Aside being a great service from an operational standpoint, Deliverr has been an absolute pleasure to work with. We have interfaced with all levels of their team up to the founders and have had a consistently great experience working with everyone. Great company. Great culture. Excited for their future and a pleasure to recommend as a service provider.

title: So easy and always get fast response
reviews: The only reason i am giving Deliverr 4 stars is because it takes quite a while for all items to be stocked. Other than that everything else is 5 stars! its so easy to use and always get a response immediately.

title: I've been working with Deliverr for a…
reviews: I've been working with Deliverr for a while and they've really helped us scale our business on Walmart. 2-day delivery has been a huge factor for conversion. I also have a dedicated account rep at Deliverr that helps me whenever I need it.

title: Deliverr helped my business a lot
reviews: Deliverr helped my business a lot. It is more than simply a delivery company. We use it for the fulfilment of our orders and the company is like an agent who will receive items, package it and deliver it to our client. Very Efficiency!

title: Great and reliable service
reviews: Great and reliable service. Easy and user friendly interface. They offer a lot of extra perks if you do Walmart and Shopify fulfillment with them. My overall experience with them was great.

title: Deliverr has definitely helped increase…
reviews: Deliverr has definitely helped increase our sales on Walmart and have been an excellent addition to our shipping operations, I highly recommend them!

title: The only company that understands 'it'.
reviews:
Deliverr is the only company that figured out a way to seamlessly connect third-party sellers to major e-commerce sites. They've been great from the beginning in terms of onboarding and they're highly communicative with sellers that they work with.

Deliverr genuinely wants to help grow sellers sales and I highly recommend them to anyone looking to grow their e-commerce business.

title: Deliverr is a great resource for…
reviews:
Deliverr is a great resource for online-retailers that need fulfillment through Walmart.com.

I would recommend them!

title: A fantastic choice for your Walmart…
reviews: A fantastic choice for your Walmart fulfillment

title: We're huge fans of Deliverr
reviews:
We're huge fans of Deliverr! Their onboarding process was awesome, super easy and the ability to handle new channels was a problem we were facing beforehand. Adding Deliverr has dramatically improved both our Walmart.com and Ebay.com revenue with 2 day shipping. Really excited to see what it can do when we build out our shopify.

Would highly recommend!

title: Terrible Support
reviews:
Terrible Support. Shipped goods over 5 weeks ago. Still didnt arrive to West coast!!??!
Bigger Issue- none of our Walmart orders are showing in Deliverr. Created Multiple Tickets. No one cares and its been delayed for weeks. Good luck trying to get support on the phone. Doesnt exist.
Horrible Experience.

title: Growing and Improving..
reviews:
There are lot of issues with the end to end process. As Deliverr do not own these warehouses, resolving issues with the partner warehouses take lot of time. I sent my inventory on time to meet the deadline provided by Deliverr but still could not get the item in stock in their warehouses to be available for BFCM sales.

Support needs lot of improvement or may be they are just understaffed.

Updated March 2020: I'm updating the rating from 2 to 4 stars based on the series of communications with the Deliverr team over past couple of months. There has been improvements on their behalf to resolve issues faster and listening to the clients to improve their system. I am waiting to see how they scale up operations in 2020.

title: Helped me expand and increase my sales…
reviews: Helped me expand and increase my sales on Walmart in a matter of weeks. Been a great experience thus far.

title: Support is horrible (They reached out)
reviews:
I wrote a negative review a few months ago but since that time Deliverr has really stepped up their game. Management contacted me personally to ensure that our problems were remedied. We appreciate that kind of attention and will continue to use Deliverr in the future.



When the actually ship the product, the service works well. The problem is their support is just awful. I have had several delays in shipments over the last week and they won't respond for at least a day, which is a big deal when the customer is promised two-day shipping.

When they have responded to this, the answer I have received is "we have to check with operations. It is peak season, this sometimes happens." No positive resolution for the customer, which hurts our business. I have refunded several order due to this issue.

title: great 3PL
reviews: Great 3PL, great customer service, our account manager was very helpful getting us on board.

title: Outrageous storage fees
reviews:
The storage fee schema is bizarrely complicated -- check it out yourself on their site [link removed].

I attempted to send in a critical mass of my items to get the ball rolling, but had to send in more than I wanted -- with Amazon FBA I would typically send in 2-3 units of a new item, whereas here it was a minimum of 10 per SKU (now down to 5), and then as soon as a couple of the units sell, you lose your Fast Tag shipping tag, thus defeating the purpose (the only way Deliverr can meet the 2-day shipping requirement is by having units near the customer, so if you have units in stock at Deliverr but not at enough fulfillment centers, you lose the tag).

Then I start getting invoices every two weeks for $80 here, $200 there – wild amounts of storage charges for my tiny products. I have products where I can fit 100+ in a single cubic foot. I thought my storage fees would be nominal. Little did I know!

Now I have to pay again to get all my items shipped back to me. Oh, and I also had to pay for an integration partner (Sellbrite, SellerActive, Geekseller, etc.) to integrate in the first place.

So my adventure with Deliverr has lost me a huge amount of money. Do not recommend.

title: Horrible customer service & ship in envelopes
reviews: Horrible customer service. They ship everything in envelopes and and customers receive damaged products. Too expensive and they do not refund when the warehouse damages products before and during shipment.

title: Two needs
reviews:
Two needs:

1.Need ability to revise inbound shipments before shipped.

2.Need bundling/kitting SKU option for sharing inventory off multiple SKUs.

Everything else is good

title: bad customer service
reviews:
bad customer service
bad experience
bad overall the entire process

title: Best fulfillment service for online retailers
reviews:
Deliverr has helped me expand our business to new online sales channels. They offer an incredible seamless platform to fulfill orders at a very competitive rates, their integrations with other platforms have helped us set up the account very fast and start working within days.

Finally, they have an amazing customer support has always been very responsive whenever I had a question or need some help.

title: Excellent fulfillment service
reviews: Excellent fulfillment service, Great customer service and willingness to grow. I highly recommend!

title: yall misspelled your name
reviews:
First, yall misspelled your name.

Second, I'd prefer less spam from Timothy Murray, Deliverr Account Executive. I understand that you spent good money buying my name off of some list. That's not a good reason to send me an email and especially not a good reason to send me one every other day.

Might I suggest your sales channels would work better if you corrected the spelling of your name, built a reputation, and stopped trying to annoy random strangers into acquiescence.

title: Awesome Experience with Deliverr!
reviews: Our company needed to find a fulfillment service that would integrate with Amazon and Ebay. Emily was our Account Executive and was instrumental in getting us onboarded to the Deliverr platform. She took time to answer questions and find solutions to any obstacle we faced. We look forward to working with Emily and Deliverr as we introduce new products and sell on other platforms!

title: Great customer service and fulfillment pricing!
reviews: I have had nothing but positive experiences with Deliverr! We've been using them for around 6 months and are super-pleased with their customer service and fulfillment network. Really excited to be a beta-tester for international shipping, which was a boon for fulfillment of our recent Kickstarter campaign.

title: Scaling eComm with Deliverr
reviews: Deliverr has been instrumental in helping to scale our eCommerce business. Their business model helps them keep costs low and the customer service, communication, and synchronization with our existing platforms has been seamless.

title: A Key Partner In Growth
reviews: I see Deliverr as a key in the growth of my brand, Well Life! Working together has already freed up a ton of my time, enabling me to concentrate on developing and launching new products.

title: Deliverr regularly uploading invalid…
reviews: Deliverr regularly uploading invalid tracking putting amazon act health in jeopardy.

title: Great customer service
reviews: Great customer service. The dashboard is very easy to use.

title: Great customer care & best in the line.
reviews:
I am using Deliverr for the last year, and they're top of the line!
Multiple channel integrations.
2-Day badges on most e-commerce sites.
Outstanding customer service.
I deal with Tyler Coopman and dealt with Lauren Lewis they're really amazing in understanding the client's needs and solving them in the quickest possible way, it's amazing to deal with them, they just made the hardest work from an e-commerce business simple!

title: Excellent customer service and fast…
reviews: Excellent customer service and fast delivery. Been using Deliverr for about a year now and overall impressed with the service. Their distributed network of warehouses cuts average package delivery down by more than half. Most of all, extremely responsive with customer service.

title: Overall Outstanding
reviews: Overall Outstanding! Coordinators are always responsive and helpful. Fast shipping is mostly on-time and affordable. Updates useful and exciting new features once in a while. Hope to see some improvements in receiving(sometimes too slow & miss some # here and there)/expansion to international shipping.

title: Overall very happy
reviews: We have been working with Deliverr for a few months now and overall are very happy with them. We switched to them from in-house fulfillment. While we have had a few lost/late packages, we have not had any problems with submitting claims or opening tickets to resolve these/receive credits for them. We have also been working through issues on an ongoing basis (i.e. SKU mapping and fast tags), throughout which our implementation contact and assigned engagement contact have both been very responsive, including via email, Slack, and phone calls. As we identify improvements, we have found that many of these have already been slotted to be added and are excited to continue our partnership with them!

title: I am big fan of Deliverr
reviews: I am big fan of Deliverr. There team is very responsive and the platform gets better week after week.

title: These five-star reviews seem so fake!
reviews: These five-star reviews seem so fake!! The company has horrible service. On several occasions, they delayed our shipment causing us negative reviews. And now constantly packages are being lost. I have no idea why they are using DHL for domestic shipments. We shipped 2 times to a customer and both times the packages were lost. The customer is extremely angry. I do not recommend this company. It used to be good but now it is all negative. We stopped working with them a month ago. Still stuck with lost packages and trying to figure out what to do!!

title: AMAZING customer experience
reviews: I have had the greatest pleasure working with our account executive, Brian, on all our latest business ventures. He has been incredibly helpful throughout the entire process and he genuinely cares for his clients and their respective business. Deliverr has such an easy and seamless process getting set up and orders flowing through for our Shopify and Amazon business. I couldn't be happier with my experience with Brian and Deliverr, and I am excited to see what the future holds for both of our businesses.

title: A very good experience!
reviews: I appreciate the experience with my sales representative as he was always ready to assist me. Plus, he was friendly. I trusted him. I wish I would have understood the implications of using Deliverr for FBM when I had the same item listed as FBA, but I am in the learning stage. Thank you to the sales rep at Deliverr.

title: Archana is the reason we use Deliverr
reviews: We've worked with amazon's FBA, rakuten logistics and I can tell you w/o a doubt the support, knowledge base and tech aggregate into this shipping company has created a stack no e-com can do w/o. You have our business for the next 10 years.

title: Our experience with Deliverr thus far
reviews: Our experience with Deliverr thus far, as far as procedure and staff, has been very efficient and professional. The technology is great and very user-friendly. We would recommend their services. We see them as a viable option as far as efficiency and cost-effectiveness.

title: shipping fee is 2 times than you ship plus inventory fee
reviews:
1: Shipping fee: calculator is off from your real charge, I have evidence, calculator: $5 for 0.5lb, the real charge is $14! All online owners, when you see this, do you think you are making money for them?

2: Arriving late: over 50% of orders are delayed arrive sometimes are lost

3: Removing inventory is extremely expensive

title: Love Them - Huge Conversion Booster
reviews:
Love This Company So Much! I highly recommend using the Fast Tags to any merchant as they boost conversions past what I even thought was possible. By turning these on I was able to see a 400%+ increase in sales which was stunning. I was skeptical, but am very happy I decided to use Deliverr.

In addition, you are provided free resources and advice free of charge. While not advertised greatly, it is super helpful. My account manager Archana has been very helpful and has helped me resolve any issues I have and has even provided me access to countless resources that are helping me grow my business.

title: Great fulfillment company for CPG brands
reviews: As an early seller on Deliverr, they're a great fulfillment company with integrations with all major marketplaces. Acharna is a rockstar and has helped make introductions and offer new growth opportunities, and helped confirm everything was working great with Walmart.com and eBay.com
